Mau Berkarir Dibidang Komunikasi atau Ingin Jadi pelaku Kreatif Desain Di Era Industri 4.0? Kuliah di Fakultas Ilmu Komunikasi Universitas Budi Luhur Creative, Visioner, Cerdas Berbudi Luhur

Wujudkan impian kamu untuk memasuki Kreatif Digital masa kini, di Program Studi: S1 ILMU KOMUNIKASI & S1 DESAIN KOMUNIKASI VISUAL (DKV) dengan Konsentrasi:

BROADCAST JOURNALISM (S1 ILMU KOMUNIKASI)

News Correspondency, News Presenter/Ancor, Reporter, Video Journalist, Media Programming.

PUBLIC RELATION (S1 ILMU KOMUNIKASI)

PR Specialist, Event Planner, Public Diplomacy Officer, PR Digital.

TOURISM COMMUNICATION (S1 ILMU KOMUNIKASI)

Travel Blogger, Travel Vloger, Branding Destination, Tourism Consultant, Travel Content Creator.

DIGITAL MEDIA & ADVERTISING (S1 ILMU KOMUNIKASI)

Brand Manager, Web Content Manager, Social Media Manager, Digital Producer, Media Planner

GAME DEVELOPMENT (S1 DESAIN KOMUNIKASI VISUAL) Multimedia Art Director, Character Designer, Enviroment Designer, Concept Artist, Designer UI Junior.

ANIMATION (S1 DESAIN KOMUNIKASI VISUAL)

2D Animation Development Artist, 3D Animation Development Artist, Puppeter Development Artist, Character Designer Artist, Animation Conceptor.

GRAPHIC DESIGN (S1 DESAIN KOMUNIKASI VISUAL)

Junior Designer, User Interface Designer, Illustrator Junior, Junior Typeface Designer.
